questionText: 1. What was the name of the wife of Emperor Nicholas II?
2. What were the last words of Socrates?
answers: We owe Asclepius a rooster,I will be back,Is that you Brut?

questionText: 3. Who was the earliest Christian philosopher?
answers: John Chrysostom,Gregory of Nyssa,Justin the Philosopher,Gregory the Theologian,Clement of Alexandria,John of Damascus,John the Evangelist

questionText: 4. How did Joan of Arc die?
answers: She was burned at the stake of the Inquisition,She was hanged,She had her head cut off on a guillotine
